template&lt; class T &gt; class shared_ptr;

{{tt|std::experimental::shared_ptr}} is a modified version of {{lc|std::shared_ptr}} that adds support for arrays.

===Member functions===
The following member functions work with {{lc|std::experimental::shared_ptr}} instead of {{lc|std::shared_ptr}} and {{lc|std::experimental::weak_ptr}} instead of {{lc|std::weak_ptr}}. The behavior is otherwise identical.

{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc inc|cpp/memory/shared_ptr/dsc destructor}}
{{dsc inc|cpp/memory/shared_ptr/dsc operator{{=}}}}

{{dsc h2|Modifiers}}
{{dsc inc|cpp/memory/shared_ptr/dsc reset}}
{{dsc inc|cpp/memory/shared_ptr/dsc swap}}

{{dsc h2|Observers}}
{{dsc inc|cpp/memory/shared_ptr/dsc use_count}}
{{dsc inc|cpp/memory/shared_ptr/dsc unique}}
{{dsc inc|cpp/memory/shared_ptr/dsc operator bool}}
{{dsc inc|cpp/memory/shared_ptr/dsc owner_before}}
{{dsc end}}

===Non-member functions===
These non-member functions are declared in the {{tt|std::experimental}} namespace, and work with {{tt|std::experimental::shared_ptr}} rather than {{lc|std::shared_ptr}}, but otherwise behaves identically to the corresponding C++14 function.

{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc inc|cpp/memory/shared_ptr/dsc make_shared}}
{{dsc inc|cpp/memory/shared_ptr/dsc allocate_shared}}
{{dsc inc|cpp/memory/shared_ptr/dsc get_deleter}}
{{dsc inc|cpp/memory/shared_ptr/dsc operator_cmp}}
{{dsc inc|cpp/memory/shared_ptr/dsc operator_ltlt}}
{{dsc inc|cpp/memory/shared_ptr/dsc swap2}}
{{dsc break}}
{{dsc inc|cpp/memory/shared_ptr/dsc atomic}}
{{dsc end}}

===Helper class templates === 
These class templates are declared in the {{tt|std::experimental}} namespace, and work with {{tt|std::experimental::shared_ptr}} and {{lc|std::experimental::weak_ptr}} rather than {{lc|std::shared_ptr}} and {{lc|std::weak_ptr}}, but otherwise behaves identically to the corresponding C++14 class template.

{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc inc|cpp/memory/dsc owner_less}}
{{dsc inc|cpp/memory/dsc enable_shared_from_this}}
{{dsc end}}
